Title: Verify logout functionality
Description: This test case aims to verify logout functionality.
Steps:
1. Log in to the application. 
2. Click the logout button.
Preconditions: User should be in login state

Title: Verify password complexity requirements
Description: This test case aims to verify password complexity requirements.
bdd_scenario:
1.Scenario: User sets a complex password 
Given the user is on the password reset page 
When the user enters a new password that does not meet complexity requirements 
And attempts to save the new password 
Then the user should see an error message indicating password complexity requirements
2.Scenario: User sets a complex username 
Given the user is on the username reset page 
When the user enters a new username that is not available on the platform
And attempts to save it in the system 
Then the user should see an error message indicating usrname is already taken

Title: Verify brute force attack prevention
Description: This test case aims to verify brute force attack prevention.
bdd_scenario:
Scenario: User is protected from brute force attacks 
Given the user is on the login page 
When the user attempts multiple login attempts with invalid credentials 
Then the account should be temporarily locked

Title: Verify account lock after multiple failed login attempts
Description: This test case aims to verify account lock after multiple failed login attempts.
Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page. 
2. Enter invalid credentials multiple times. 
3. Verify the account is locked after a certain number of attempts.
Outcome:
1. The login page should be displayed
2. Each time invalid credentials are entered, an error message indicating invalid credentials should be displayed
3. The account should be locked, and an error message indicating that the account is locked should be displayed.
bdd_scenario:
Scenario: User's account is locked after multiple failed login attempts 
Given the user is on the login page 
When the user enters invalid credentials multiple times 
Then the account should be locked after a certain number of attempts
Preconditions: Should have a valid email id

Title: Verify view profile functionality
Description: This test case aims to verify view profile functionality.
Steps:
1. Log in to the application. 
2. Navigate to the profile page.
bdd_scenario:
Scenario: User views profile 
Given the user is logged in 
When the user navigates to the profile page 
Then the user should see their profile information

Title: Verify profile update security
Description: This test case aims to verify profile update security.
bdd_scenario:
Scenario: User attempts insecure profile update 
Given the user is on the profile page 
When the user attempts to update profile with invalid data 
Then the update should be rejected with an error message

Title: Verify order details
Description: This test case aims to verify order details.
bdd_scenario:
1.Scenario: User views order details 
Given the user is on the order history page 
When the user clicks on an order to view details 
Then the user should see the order details
2.Scenario: User views profile details 
Given the user is on the profile page 
When the user clicks on profile to view details 
Then the user should see the profile details

Title: Verify phone number update
Description: This test case aims to verify phone number update.
Outcome: 5. The profile page should refresh, and the updated phone number should be displayed in the phone number field
